stream

Interface SimulatorStream

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CountAcksStream, CountDataPacketStream, DelayedPacketStream, DropPacketStream, DuplicatePacketStream, InjectPacketStream, PacketStream, WrongSenderStream

    public interface SimulatorStream
    Sends and Receives DatagramPackets and counts the number of packets received

    • Method Summary
